testcaseName: # 1 (Td) to # 2 (Tdap) interval 28-4 days in child age > 7 years.  Forecast # 3 in six months.
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from previous dose (catch-up)
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child 8 years of age is administered a Tdap vaccine as a second dose (and at an interval of 28 -4 days from the first dose) that the dose is valid. Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange: Past Due Date was missing and child is in catch-up.  Past Due Date added to align with Recommended Date.
